Name: Give Me Fever
Ingredients: 15 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (flamed).
EXPRESS flamed lemon zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This drink combines the fever quenching G&T with medicinal lavender and flavoursome mezcal from the Mexican territories where us Brits are susceptible to "fever... give me fever. What a lovely way to burn."
History: Created 3rd May 2014 by yours truly while Fever by Peggy Lee was playing.
Nutrition: One serving of Give Me Fever contains 164 calories
